youtube.title: How Thrombectomy Devices Remove Blood Clots | Medical Animation
youtube.description: Discover the incredible technology behind mechanical thrombectomy. This video shows how specialized devices are used to capture and remove blood clots (thrombi) from vessels to restore blood flow and prevent strokes or heart attacks. Perfect for students and science enthusiasts!
